item.description:
Ho Ho Ho everyone,

You are invited to a Margariiittttaaa Christmas Party! I can feel my Martha Stewart coming on and I'm ready for a fun time. Bring your singing voices, your game faces and whatever else you'd like. BYOB. If you want to bring a food item please let me know, so I can plan the menu.

Allergy alert: I have a dog named Princess.

Parking logistics: Please park on the street or the CVS parking lot. The spots in the front are already allccated and the cranky neighbors do not like people to park on the side on my house either.

Don't forget to bring $1.00 for Nina our awesome organizer.

I look forward to hosting you all! 

Take care,

Margaret
item.how_to_find_us: Margaret's place 163 S Main St. Colchester Ct

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: A Margariiittttaaa Christmas Party
